title: The Rivalry Returns: Wout van Aert and Mathieu van der Poel Set for Five Cyclocross Clashes
content:
Van Aert reported to race very selective five-race program this winter, participation at 'cross worlds to be confirmed.

Read the full article at The Rivalry Returns: Wout van Aert and Mathieu van der Poel Set for Five Cyclocross Clashes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
